preqs: (FIT9131 or FIT9133) and FIT9132A working knowledge of Java and Python.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {C5003, C6001, C6004} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed 1 units in {FIT9131, FIT9133} and  Must have passed 1 units in {FIT9132})

description: This unit teaches about working with different kinds of data, documents, graphs, spatial data. Distributed processing is introduced using Hadoop and Spark technologies, including streaming, graph processing and using NoSQL. Programming assignments are done in the HortonWorks environment.
